damage_resistances: damage from spells; non magical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing (from stoneskin)

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc:
The archmage is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared:

â€¢ Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp
â€¢ 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile
â€¢ 2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step
â€¢ 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell,fly, lightning bolt
â€¢ 4th level (3 slots): banishment, fire shield, stoneskin*
â€¢ 5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force
â€¢ 6th level (1 slot): globe of invulnerability
â€¢ 7th level (1 slot): teleport
â€¢ 8th level (1 slot): mind blank*
â€¢ 9th level (1 slot): time stop
* The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

name: Archmage

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
